main_features.name: Web Scraping Engine
main_features.description: Automatically scrapes convocatoria data from the EU's website and updates the database with new records.

main_features.name: Dashboard
main_features.description: Provides real-time monitoring of the system, statistics on scraping activities, and detailed results for tenders.

corrective_actions.description: Correct the validation error in `app/main.py` by ensuring that all required dependencies are correctly imported and used.
